Reviews: Located at the Padang Old City area, just around the corner from Siti Nurbaya Bridge across Batang Anai River. JNE is one of many delivery services in Indonesia. Giving good services, the business entity continues to grow.

2 times an order was sent via JNE, the first package arrived on time because it was COD
The second package is non-COD, the delivery is always delayed for 2 days, even ‚Ä¶

Look at the tracking. My order was delivered on the 17th, but after that it said "I am rescheduling delivery to the address".. FYI, I never asked to delay delivery, why did it arrive unilaterally and delay delivery?? Meanwhile, now it's the 19th, there's still no clarity..
Several times it was a hassle, the position of the package was not clear where it was and the delivery was late
Taking too lightly a shipment of small value, the goods sent did not arrive at the destination address, disappointing
Worst JNe service ever, to this day my package hasn't arrived. Very disappointing

You can also use JNE. There are a lot of CS but there are lots of empty staff too, maybe because it's a week, that could be the case. ‚Ä¶

Usually JNE is fast and on time, why is it now delayed, the food didn't arrive, I'm afraid it won't taste good anymore because the payment is already expensive, really disappointed

Is this JNE working or not? My food delivery, you know, has been stuck since the 2nd here. You think that food can go stale over time in a cardboard box. I'm using Express, at least it's running. It hasn't been sent since the 2nd. What are you doing sleeping?
Today I sent goods via JNE, and the service is quite good, hopefully it can be maintained, even improved.

How come this expedition wasn't ready? The delivery took a really long time, it was a holiday, even a holiday when the delivery was delivered to the outlet to pick it up yourself but it was rejected. It's funny indeed. Unlike the other expedition which prioritizes service and customer satisfaction, the delivery is always on time.
In my opinion, the expedition was the slowest.. even from West Sumatra, it took 4 days before it arrived.. usually JNT takes 1 day to arrive.. I don't know if the JNE people are working or not..
Wow, I sent you the package, what are you doing, pick it up or not, you're going to deliver it, you're just joking, you lizard

Sejak tanggal 4 paket saya di warehouse banda aceh mulu, status ga berubah2 sampai sekarang. Biasanya kalo udah tiba di warehouse banda aceh langsung dikirim ke sub agen ke kabupaten lain. Ini masih disitu2 aja.

Barang yg saya terima pecah, padahal di kotak udah tertulis "Jangan Dibanting, Mudah Pecah". pihak JNE tak mau bertanggung jawab.!! saya sarankan jangan menggunakan jasa JNE, pas penyortiran barang mereka tidak hati¬≤ asal lempar¬≤ aja.!!!

kaga jelas ini jne, barang sudah sampai tangal 12 sampai tangal 15 belum diantar, pas mw jmput, harus tunggu 3 jama, belum di proses, terpaksa saya pulang, kecewa kecewa, kalau gak sangup layani dengan baik, tutup saja kantor nya
Pengiriman sangat lama padahal saat cek resi sudah 3hari sampai tapi belum jga di antar ke rumah mohon tingkatkan pelayanan nya

Performa dari kinerja para pegawai sangat tidak memuaskan, barang yang sudah sampai terlalu lama menunggak digudang dan lama untuk didistribusikan, padahal konsumen sudah menunggu barang yang dikirimkan karena sangat membutuhkan barang tersebut, mohon untuk memperbaiki kinerja para pegawainya.
